message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120, which is the maximum I'm comfortable spending. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm offering the product to you for $165.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still too high for me. I'm sticking with my initial offer of $120. If you're not comfortable with that, I'll need to explore other options.
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to come down a bit further, so I'm offering the product to you for $155.
